name: Free Kick - Euro 2017 Version
description:
Bright and colorful free kick game for those who are looking for the best 3D football game.
Choose your favorite football team, score beautiful goals with free kicks, score points, watch online rating of your team!
Each scored free-kick adds points to your team rating and decreases the rating of your opponent.
Also can you share your beautiful results with your friends, and compete with them online.

The game has three basic modes:
- "Championship" - National teams online rating . Score points for your team and take away points from the rival teams.
- "Arcade" - Participate in the Gamecenter rankings. Score free kicks and penalty shots, score points, and compete with other players and friends.
- "Training" - a chance to hone your skills without risking positions in the rankings.

Invite your friends - the more players will play, the more chances to your national team to win the UEFA European Championship 2016 Edition!


Good luck and we hope you enjoy our game.


Latest updates:
- Added participating country France
- Start pop-up - Added checkbox "Hide"
- Animated rostrum
- Championship: increased the number of levels
- Fixed bug with Leaderboards
- Fixed bugs with text font
